features: GENTLE NUTRITION MODELED AFTER BREAST MILK: Pure Bliss by Similac infant formula is thoughtfully crafted nutrition that’s easy to digest and gentle on little tummies
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES & NON-GMO: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones. Pure Bliss also has no antibiotics or palm olein oil and is non-GMO
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYE DEVELOPMENT: Our formula has DHA and ARA to support brain and eye development
STARTS WITH FRESH MILK FROM GRASS-FED COWS: Crafted with milk sourced from family-owned Irish farms where cows have the freedom to graze outdoors
PREFERRED BRAND: Similac is the Number 1 infant formula brand fed in hospitals
body.description: Pure Bliss by Similac* infant formula is gentle nutrition modeled after breast milk that has been imported from Europe since 2016. Our complete nutrition formula contains no artificial growth hormones† or antibiotics and is non-GMO.‡ Pure Bliss also has DHA and ARA, nutrients like those found in breast milk that support brain and eye development. It is crafted with milk sourced from family-owned Irish farms where cows have the freedom to graze outdoors. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. ‡ Ingredients not genetically engineered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Imported From Europe Pure Bliss by Similac infant formula is gentle, easy-to-digest nutrition that is modeled after breast milk. Our thoughtfully crafted formula provides complete nutrition that supports baby’s first 12 months. Imported from Europe since 2016, it starts with fresh milk from grass-fed cows that is sourced from family-owned Irish farms. Supports Brain & Eye Development Pure Bliss infant formula with iron provides the nutrition your baby needs from birth to 12 months, with nucleotides to help support the immune system, lutein for eye development, and DHA and ARA to support brain development. Pure Bliss by Similac for Toddlers Pure Bliss by Similac Toddler Drink is thoughtfully crafted nutrition with probiotics. Our toddler drink has 29 key nutrients, as well as DHA and ARA to support brain development.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure Bliss - A Delight for My Little One!
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to Pure Bliss by Similac Infant Formula, and it's been a game-changer for my baby! The gentle and easy-to-digest formula has made a noticeable difference in my little one's comfort and happiness.I appreciate that it's non-GMO, giving me the confidence that I'm providing my baby with a high-quality product. The powder format is convenient and easy to prepare, making feeding times a breeze.Not only does my baby love the taste, but I've also observed improved digestion and contentment. Pure Bliss has truly lived up to its name in our household, bringing joy and satisfaction to both me and my baby.I highly recommend Pure Bliss by Similac to fellow parents seeking a reliable and nourishing formula for their little ones. It's a pure delight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little guy loves it
reviews.reviewText: This formula was fantastic and my little guy loved it. I used to use earths, best formula, but with a shortage can’t find it anywhere. I tried this with for my little guy instead, and he has had no issues. Great for the sensitive tummys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! I especially like that it’s cheaper here on Amazon than in Walmart. And it’s cheaper than the other stuff by similac. That’s all good stuff but the best is that there’s no corn syrup solids. Crazy that corn syrup is put on formula. The only draw back is that we’ve transitioned to just formula so my baby is constipated at present. But it helps to put just a little bit more water in the bottle past your desired ounce level.EDIT: this is the second time, on separate containers, that I’ve cut myself on the inside downward facing lip of the can. I don’t know if I’m just stupid or what 😅 but the first time it bled like a pig. The pic is of my second cut- the smaller one. So just be extra careful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves it, and our doctor approves!
reviews.reviewText: This might be my most often purchased item on Amazon. My baby has been using it for 4 months now (starting at age 6 months), and we’ve had no issues. My only complaint as with other formulas is that the scoop is always buried in the formula. Other than that, my baby has loved this formula from day 1 and continues to drink almost her whole bottle each time. Our pediatrician said that it was a great choice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I nursed my daughter for 8 months and then decided to switch to formula. We wanted to try this since I was worried how she would take the change and she took to the switch seamlessly. The ingredients seem to be a better option over some other formulas and it actually seems to have a better taste as well (my husband tasted it and said it was a little sweeter than others). I also love that it doesn’t smell awful like others. We used Similac Advanced with our other daughter and it had that noticeable formula smell. It doesn’t make my daughter gassy or upset her stomach so I think this would be great to try with babies that seem to have a more sensitive stomach (as long as a pediatrician approves!). The only negative I can think of is that it isn’t as readily available at my local stores but Target seems to be stocking it lately. We’re so happy with this that we decided we’re going to try the toddler version when our daughter turns one in a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrible to mix but otherwise great
reviews.reviewText: I like this because it doesn't smell bad at all, and makes me feel better that its full of good stuff. But its really terrible to mix, hot water, cold water, doesn't matter, it just takes forever to mix in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Exceptional Nutrition and Happy Tummies: My Review of the Ultimate Baby Formula"
reviews.reviewText: After conducting thorough research and comparing various options, our top priority was finding a formula that closely mimicked the benefits of breast milk while ensuring our baby remained comfortable without experiencing gas or bloating. We were pleased to discover this remarkable product, which not only fulfilled our expectations but also exceeded them in several aspects. The formula effortlessly blends with water, eliminating any concerns about clumps or lumps, and unlike its counterparts, it possesses a pleasant aroma that doesn't overpower. Moreover, our little one displayed remarkable contentment, as evident by their minimal fussiness. This formula has truly proven to be a standout choice for our baby's nutritional needs, and we highly recommend it to fellow parents seeking a professional-grade baby formula. When we cannot give bm this is great for supplement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Always stocked at Target, Amazon, and HEB. The only formulas we’ve ever used. Its been 8 months and our baby still loves it and is so so healthy!
